column5: According to zone 17 regs Walleye is open Jan1-Mar1 In Sidney township upstream from the first dam on the Trent River.  Anyone ever try this spot.  If this is along the river it would seem a dangerous place to be in the winter  It also lists Perch, Crappie and Sunfish open all year
Never tried it Jeff, to be honest, I'm not even sure where it is but I have been wondering how far you can come down the Scugog River and still be considered to be fishing Lake Scugog.
Jeff...try sending Ron a PM  Seems to me he used to icefish there for crappie...
